title: Mini-Ep 282: Shine Bright Like Diamond Art
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 282: Shine Bright Like Diamond Art
description:
Kate loves herself some salicylic acid spray recommended by a listener and Doree makes a wildly delicious family meal. Then, listeners wonder if there are any tips for post eye surgery self-care, make sure Kat + Dor know the true meaning of the eggplant emoji, and question whether they’re the maniac who expects too much from house guests. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
